text: (sing thi yud ma di cak phwk ya hud) pen khxng brrda phu xphyph thi khadsn sung thuk khab lixxk cak bankeidmeuxngnxn khxng phwk khea læa thxdthing thraphysin khxng phwk khea pheux sæwngha khwam pordpran ca kxallxhˌ læa khwam yindi khxng phraxngkh læa chwy he lux xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh chn hela nan phwk khea khux phu saty cring
